Package warzone.model

Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
warzone.model.GameContext
public class GameContext
extends java.lang.Object
This class represent the state of the game, and it contains some useful instances for other classes.

      Parameters:

      p_playerB - second given player
      Returns:
